overview: The year is 1885, and necrophiliac Dr. Hitchcock likes to drug his wife for sexual funeral games. One day he accidentally administers an overdose and kills her. Several years later he remarries, with the intention of using the blood of his new bride to bring his first wife's rotting corpse back to life.
tagline: The candle of his lust burnt brightest in the shadow of the grave!
title: The Horrible Dr. Hichcock
